Related repos

  • Code and tutorials for building GPT-style language models from the ground up in PyTorch
  • Creates 3D architecture diagrams from 2D models
  • Toolkit for data visualization apps

  • Generates 3D models from text
  • Web 3D engine for BIM and CAD
  • Visualizes and explores 3D models in a browser
